website_summaries.verdict: Although it's not suited for serious knitters, it's a great option for novices and kids who need a realistic machine to learn the craft.
pros: A kids' version that teaches the basics of knitting
Comes with items to get kids started, including yarn, needles, buttons, and beads
cons: Some durability concerns due to reports of broken pieces

customer_reviews.title: Kid Tested Mother Approved!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old daughter says, quote, "I LOVE this knit loom. I give it 5 stars!" :) After verifying with the manufacture that this product does not contain wool yarn (which we have a serious allergy to), I purchased 2 of the Creativity for Kids Quick Knit Looms- one for my daughter, and one for myself- to learn a new handicraft skill. My daughter took to it immediately, her first time ever, and has been successfully knitting on both small and large included looms. The included paper instructions and online YouTube instructional videos make this product truly a quick and easy-to-learn craft. Thank you Faber-Castell for another kid and mother approved product!
customer_reviews.author: The H Family

customer_reviews.title: Fun knitting kit but knobs missing
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of the tool kit, one for my daughter and the other for her friend as a gift. We opened one package and found two knobs missing from the smaller knit loom. My daughter really enjoys the larger knit loom and is happily knitting with it. However, she was disappointed that she couldn't use the smaller knit loom because two knobs were missing from it.
customer_reviews.author: LauraL

customer_reviews.title: This a great product to teach knitting and will introduce any child ...
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old son loves this. He is a creative and crafty kid, and was thrilled to knit his first hat. Gave him a real sense of accomplishment and helped him stay busy. This loom makes knitting much less frustrating than trying with two needles, and allowed him to be almost completely self sufficient (I helped with the beginning stitches and removing the project and attaching tassels). This a great product to teach knitting and will introduce any child to crafts with yarn.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Great for the grandkids!
customer_reviews.text: It's easy enough for my 10 year old granddaughter. I appreciate things that I can give to my grandkids that allow them to use their creativity. In this day of electronics, I feel it is important to teach the kids to work to create things that they can use. What a feeling of accomplishment! She loves it and will continue to use it for years. It's the gift that keeps on giving!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The gift is 100% "Carly Approved" and I can't recommend it highly enough
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our eight year old granddaughter for Christmas. She immediately dropped all other gifts to begin working on a knitting project with this loom! It knits in a circle and so is ideal for making hats or small purses. The gift is 100% "Carly Approved" and I can't recommend it highly enough. A great way to introduce a child to knitting!
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.B.

customer_reviews.title: I'm having more fun with this than my 7yr old daughter is
customer_reviews.text: I'm having more fun with this than my 7yr old daughter is! It doesn't give you clear instructions on how to tie off your project but i'm sure you can google it and find a video. It comes with enough yarn for 1 or 2 small projects but Walmart has an entire selection for a great price so that was okay. This isn't simple enough for my daughter to enjoy but would probably be a nice gift for a 10 yr old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is 5 STARS... BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 children under 7 and I could see a 5 year old doing this just fine. It is AMAZING... and a perfect option for a child who wants to crochet or knit. This is much easier and the progress is quick. BUT......... watch a youtube video before you try to get started. The instructions STINK!!! Horrible, horrible, horrible instructions!!! You have to go the same direction, in the same "looping" direction. Anyway, trial and error was a PAIN, but the results have been great. My 7 year old loves it and it is really easy to do, really. Very happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 5, M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Fab- easy and satisfying for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Ibought this for my. 8 year old. Both she and four year old have done rows but the most amazing part is that I have knit 3 hats! No experience at all ! I even gave one hat as a baby gift. This is super easy and really fun. I recommend it seriously to older children, teens and adult beginners, or younger kids who are determined to learn to knit. It's a great experience for young kids to help with but many will not have the attention span or patience to finish. But then again I don't have a long attention span either...this is indeed a QUICK knit loom.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Clare

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this product. We purchased it as part of her birthday present and she was thrilled. We had to purchase additional wool but that was no problem at all. She is getting so many hours of pleasure out of using this and we are planning on getting one for her younger sister as soon as she is old enough to use it. It is well made and is a quality product. Do not hesitate to purchase this.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Allen

customer_reviews.title: Review with Input from the girl who made the hat!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my granddaughter and she reports that the directions were a little confusing And the pom poms were hard to attach so they were even. However she is very satisfied with the finished hat and she is planning on buying more yarn to make grandpa a hat! So all in all it was a successful gift!
customer_reviews.author: sookie

customer_reviews.title: Great for my 8-year old
customer_reviews.text: Great for my 8-year old. We did have to figure out a system (rubber band worked best after several tries) to keep the last stitch on the last post after winding the yarn around, so that she could loop the stitches over without everything coming undone. This isn't age or ability-related, I don't know how everyone else manages this? Otherwise, great product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Yangas

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: My 13th year old daughter learned how to knit when I bough this. Recommended for all beginners. She now has a new hobby and loves to knit.
customer_reviews.author: Kit Kat

customer_reviews.title: she loved it for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece, she loved it for Christmas. The only downside is there are not enough directions to help kids new to knitting. We end up looking up videos on YouTube to help her get the hang of learning to knit with a loom.
customer_reviews.author: Paula S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent kit, except...
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent kit for beginners, perfect for my 7-year-old. The only gotcha, in my opinion, it needs a storage option, or at least a holster for that sharp hook. The box itself is cute, but once you use up all the yarn, there is no need for it anymore, and all the little loose items in that box are flying all over the place. You need to add a little plastic storage container for the small items, including the hook, which will make this simply perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Crainny

customer_reviews.title: Great for 7 year old
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 7 year old niece's birthday. She loves arts and crafts but has never done any type of knitting or crocheting. I received a picture from her mom the next morning with her about halfway done making the purse.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Great for the creative person
customer_reviews.text: Had a slight problem with ordering the product but after we were able to resolve it. It is a very awesome product for any creative and imaginative child or adult who is wanting to make some unique and special gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan & Cher VasQuez

customer_reviews.title: Knitting
customer_reviews.text: I learned how to knit using the loom...I just need some more of that type of thread to make other things of different colors......PURPLE,GREEN, & GOLD & OTHERS
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Great for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great for kids to make quick knitted hats and other items. It's a great activity besides computer and video games. It's has pretty easy to understand directions for kids 10 and up. I would say you would have to help the younger kids if they wanted to use until they got the hang of it.
customer_reviews.author: Leith Walden

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I like it very much
customer_reviews.text: Very good! It's simple. My daughter loves it. She loves the hats she makes!
customer_reviews.author: JIA JUN WU

customer_reviews.title: simple and cute
customer_reviews.text: my 8 year old knitted like a pro I didnt have to help her she said it was so easy!
customer_reviews.author: MisterTenPercent

customer_reviews.title: Not any eaiser than regular knitting
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this in hopes of having an easier knitting option for my six year old, to get him started. Unfortunately I found it pretty tricky to use myself, with the yard easily sliding off the pegs. I think if a child is ready for this, you might as well start them on regular knitting needles.
customer_reviews.author: Heather E.

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for teaching children how to do different things!
customer_reviews.text: This product was perfect for my “need to be busy” grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: Therisa G Hemingway

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old has had a lot of fun making hats and purses with this loom
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old has had a lot of fun making hats and purses with this loom. My only complaint is that some of the pegs won't stay in and have had to be re-glued numerous times. It's really frustrating when she's in the middle of a project, and we have to try to glue the thing back together without ruining the yarn.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho mama

customer_reviews.title: Easy for toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 5 year old. Bought because not so many small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Barker

customer_reviews.title: Arrived quickly!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift. So I have not been able to follow up with the child to ask if she likes it. But as a intermediate crocheter I thought it was an awesome way to introduce a child to yarn crafts
customer_reviews.author: Beth Brady

customer_reviews.title: A gift she loved
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift and I think she loved it!! For a 7-yr-old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 7 year old granddaughter loved this knitting loom kit
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old granddaughter loved this knitting loom kit. She was able to make a colorful hat for herself right away and is now working on hats for her sister and brother. It was a good way to get her interested in knitting. The hook that came with the kit broke right away, but she now uses a crochet hook to do the work.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: ... for my 6 year old just yet but I love it and will continue to use it until she ...
customer_reviews.text: Probably a little too advanced for my 6 year old just yet but I love it and will continue to use it until she starts it!
customer_reviews.author: Sheena Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great kit, easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old sister's birthday. I had to help her with getting started but she got the hang of it really quickly and has been having tons of fun with it. It's easy to do and actually turns out something useful (like a hat) unlike most craft kits. Requires less coordination than traditional knitting which is a huge plus.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my daughter. She loves it but the smaller loom is useless because the pegs don't fit the holes.
customer_reviews.author: Waldo

customer_reviews.title: The kit is very nice and quick shipment
customer_reviews.text: Ordered for my 8 year old granddaugher. The kit is very nice and quick shipment. The only thing I would give a thumbs down on is the instructions need more detail. For example the first thing she made was a hat. We did not know what to do with the anchor portion after we made our first two rounds.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: My seven year old knitted a hat on her first try
customer_reviews.text: My seven year old daughter is very crafty. She knitted the most darling hat on her very first try! I was shocked at how cute it turned out. She wears it all the time know. It was so much fun I am going to order a bigger size for me to work on over the holidays.
customer_reviews.author: Red Ink

customer_reviews.title: AND THE YARN THAT COMES WITH THIS LOOM KIT IS EXCELLENT QUALITY YARN
customer_reviews.text: MY WIFE LOVES THIS KIT SHE HAS MADE A FEW ITEMS. AND THE YARN THAT COMES WITH THIS LOOM KIT IS EXCELLENT QUALITY YARN. AND THE YARN COLOR IS BEAUTIFUL

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Fun!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 11 year old daughter and it is super easy! We have already made a hat, next she wants to make a scarf. We tried a knitting machine and we found that more difficult to use and finish off the pieces than this hand loom. Great fun!

customer_reviews.title: Pegs seemed to break easily
customer_reviews.text: The pegs seemed to break pretty easily-- so we opted for a different brand when we replaced the loom.

customer_reviews.title: love this so very much

customer_reviews.title: Perfect present!!
customer_reviews.text: The most delightful gift for a craft loving kid!! Everything you need to create hats and more, including clear directions and yarn. This will keep a little hands and minds busy for hours with nice tokens of accomplishment as well. Honestly, even an adult with no experience can use this kit to produce some lovely items.

customer_reviews.title: It's a great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: I ordered TWO for birthday gifts for 9 year old girls. It's a great gift idea. I was bummed when I saw it for $5/cheaper on Michael's website. Could've saved myself $10 total. Oh well...still a great gift for girls.
customer_reviews.author: Kris10

customer_reviews.title: She fees like a big girl because she can make things like ...
customer_reviews.text: I remember having one similar when I was a child so I had to get one for my daughter. She feels like a big girl because she can make things like me when I crochet. I love seeing something from my childhood bring a smile to my child's face, great product.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: My daughter just got this for Christmas and is currently working on the hat. So far she's enjoying creating something for herself and she loves the colors!

customer_reviews.title: Nice product! Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Nice but still learning! Love the colors and can't wait to make something with my kiddo!

customer_reviews.title: but yarn furnished isn't very good. The tassel maker wears out too quickly
customer_reviews.text: Loom works well, but yarn furnished isn't very good. The tassel maker wears out too quickly! In my opinion there should be a pompom maker included or at least a source for the customer to obtain one.

customer_reviews.title: The kit is great for young kids and beginners to learn
customer_reviews.text: The kit is great for young kids and beginners to learn. Instructions are easy to follow. The only downside is, the loom is quite small for a hat - it could barely fit my six-year-old.

customer_reviews.author: Biz

customer_reviews.title: Fun for all ages
customer_reviews.text: This is delightfully easy to use and has clear, concise instructions. I've been knitting for eight years but still found using a knitting loom frightening; this kit took all that fear away with the simplicity and elegance of design and foresight. Everything you'll need to make small craft items is included and explained in the instruction manual, and the product itself is fool-proof (and I'm quite a fool). I would recommend this to anyone who wants to bring the joy of knitting into their life, whether they've been knitting for years or want to learn (or teach their friends and young ones)!
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Great for even a six year old who enjoys crafts with a little help from an adult to get her started.
customer_reviews.text: Our granddaughter caught on quickly and made a headband and a finger pupped the first day. It takes a patient adult to get a child started, though.

customer_reviews.title: Great introduction to knitting/crochet.
customer_reviews.text: Loom knitting is a lot simpler to learn that needle knitting. I bought this for my six year old, and she loves it. Especially the part where she can plan her own colors and yarns to make the projects. There isn't much yarn in the kit, but it is enough to get you started before you have to start buying more.

customer_reviews.text: My granddaughters love this gift and have already made some scarfs with it. It will be something they will use for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Debra C. Grady

product_meta.title: Creativity for Kids Quick Knit Loom – Make Your Own Pom Pom Hat And Accessories For Beginners (Packaging May Vary)
product_meta.description:
Knitting you own creations Can be fun, relaxing and rewarding for children! Knitting can also improve children's fine motor coordination, math, comprehension, planning, critical thinking, and problem solving skills. The quick knit Loom kit will make creating and finishing your project effortless with easy to follow instructions, and how-to videos with step by step instructions on how to make a pom pom Hat and cozy. The handheld Loom provided in this knitting kit also makes for an easy project! Simply wind and weave the yarn through the loom to make your creations! This kids’ Loom kit comes with Chunky rainbow yarn! You will be amazed by the varying bright colors Your creation will turn out to be! You can create a warm 2 eared pom pom Hat, cozy or any other objects you can think of! This open-ended craft activity allows for imagination and creativity to take the lead! Since 1976, Creativity for Kids has created innovative craft activity kits designed to stimulate and encourage natural creativity.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Learning to knit and crochet is fun, creative, and benefits children in a variety of ways. Many teachers and doctors attest that knitting improves children’s fine motor coordination, and benefits their math, comprehension, planning, critical thinking, and problem solving skills. Unlike traditional knitting or crochet, this Quick Knit Loom is easy to use. There are no special skills required, simply wind the yarn counterclockwise around the looms then flip the yarn loops to create quick and easy fashions! With a large circle loom and a two-sided hand loom you have all the tools necessary to create whatever chic objects you want! Make a cute beanie, a fashionable purse, or anything else you can think of! Since 1976, Creativity for Kids has been creating safe, innovative products that meet or exceed U.S. safety standard as determined by independent laboratory testing. Our mission is to provide children with experiences that stimulate and encourage their natural creativity. Our open-ended products offer fun-filled opportunities for children to create, learn, pretend, explore, and learn.
feature_bullets: KNITTING KIT FOR BEGINNERS –The Quick Knit Loom Kit is perfect for beginners or children to complete. The loom provided will help you to create rainbow accessories easily! You will have access to easy to follow instructions, and a how-to video which will provide a step by step guide on creating loom projects.
RAINBOW ARTS AND CRAFTS – This knitting kit includes 90 yards of chunky rainbow yarn for you to create with! You will also receive 2 rainbow pom poms to attach to your hat!

LOOM KNITTING – Loom Knitting is a repetitive motion of wrapping and hooking. This boosts fine motor coordination, math, comprehension, planning, critical thinking, and problem-solving skills. Using the 9 inch loom to knit can provide a calming arts and crafts activity for children and adults alike!
MAKE YOUR OWN POM POM HAT – Create a Pom Pom Hat and cup cozy with this knitting kit! Make a 2 eared rainbow pom pom hat and a colorful cozy to keep you and your drinks warm!

ARTS AND CRAFTS FOR KIDS – This kit will inspire creativity! You can follow the instructions step by step or think outside the box and make whatever objects you can think of! This open-ended craft activity allows for imagination and creativity to take the lead! Since 1976, Creativity for Kids has created innovative craft activity kits designed to stimulate and encourage natural creativity.
